website_summaries.verdict: Tops our pack for being versatile, warm, and stylish – the best choice for most dogs and owners who want quality and an attractive style.
pros: A nicely-made hoodie sweater that looks great on most dogs
Owners love the cute unisex style
Made of warm acrylic material that's soft to the touch
Several sizes – fits up to 29-inch chests
cons: Depending on the dog, it may run either slightly tight or large, but most owners say this size discrepancy isn't enough to be a deal-breaker
Not a good fit for long dogs with short legs such as Dachshunds

customer_reviews.title: Cute design and colors
customer_reviews.text: I've bought many Blueberry Pet sweaters size 14 for my corgi who is 16" neck, 22" chest and 15" length. However, their sizing run smaller recently. Carnation pink fits her snugly yet too short at the belly area while the Hearts is too tight and has shorter back length FYI: Carnation pink is 15" length included the folding neck, decent thickness and stretchy fabric, very short belly. Hearts pattern is 13" length, thicker than Carnation pink and not much stretchy, but it covers the belly better.
customer_reviews.author: Cire

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 12" for my 5 lb Pom. It's a little big on her through the body but I had tried a 10" in a different color of this style and it was too small. Even being a little big, it looks adorable and she loves it. We are moving from the South to the PNW soon and this will help keep her warm through the cold and damp winter.
customer_reviews.author: MeadowlarkMT

customer_reviews.title: Adorable.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, stitching, color and flex. Highly, highly recommend. Measure your pet, but always remember you can return and reorder a better size. Just like people clothes, sizes vary based on maker. This fit as expected and Audrey is breaking hearts.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: My rat terrier loves her new sweater and I love it too
customer_reviews.text: I usually don’t write reviews, but I have to. My rat terrier loves her new sweater and I love it too! She’s 10 months, and I ordered the 14”. It’s a teeny bit big, but she’s still growing so it should fit next year. It’s very soft and thick, but doesn’t restrict her movements. I like that it’s long enough to reach her tail, as most sweaters only cover the torso and aren’t long enough for her body. It’s comfy around the neck and not too tight, and the arm holes are in the correct place. It came just in time for snow in Texas! I will probably order another one for when this one is in the washer! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great dog sweater
customer_reviews.text: Punky loves her new sweater. She is only about 13 lbs but her body is long. She’s wearing the 14in and it’s just a little too big, but I’d rather that than too small. She’ll just get a few extra treats until she fills it out. The neck hole was wider than on other sweaters I’ve tried which makes it easier to dress a squirmy dog. Feels like nice quality and heavy enough to keep a dog warm. Would definitely buy other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Meehan

customer_reviews.title: Color is not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that in the pictures, it looks red and gray, when in reality, it is very much red and blue. As far as sizing, I have an 8 lb yorkie and I ordered the 10 inch. It's a little big, but not enough to return it, especially since a smaller size isn't offered anyway. But just note that if you have a dog smaller than mine, this sweatshirt probably won't fit!
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: My pibble loves it!
customer_reviews.text: The first sweater I bought for my American Staffordshire Terrier got a tear in multiple places in the first 3 days of normal wear, so I messaged if I could return it and get the same style and size. They immediately sent out a brand new one free of charge! My dog's measurements are 18" neck AND 18" length (from the base of neck to tail) with a chest girth of 27", so I opt for the 20" and it fits her perfectly. She is in love with it and it has a cute little hood to keep her ears warm. All around amazed with this sweater! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: Kalin J.

customer_reviews.title: Soft, Warm and Well Made But May Need to Size Up
customer_reviews.text: My small dog lives in sweaters all winter long here in Michigan. So she has a whole collection of Blueberry Pet sweaters and loves them all. She's never had one with a hood or sleeves before so I thought I would try. I ordered the same size I always get in Blueberry brand but it was way tighter than normal and she could hardly move. So I ended up returning it and getting the next size up. That one works great. She looks absolutely adorable and is so cozy. Just like all our other Blueberry sweaters, it is well made with sturdy seams and thick cozy yarn, not cheap and thin. Another winner!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Ras

customer_reviews.title: If you’re looking for a soft sweater with sleeves this is it
customer_reviews.text: A perfect sweater for my dog. I was looking specifically for a sweater with sleeves because often arm holes are huge and leave too much belly exposed to keep her warm. The size chart is accurate. My dog is 10 inches from collar to base of tail. She is 6 1/2 pounds with a 15” chest circumference. I bought the “10 inch length“ size, “marled color block” style. The sweater is super soft and it looks well-made. I’m buying another one and the other color. I would love to see more colors offered.
customer_reviews.author: Danabee

customer_reviews.title: Ok size. Totally different color than shown
customer_reviews.text: I got the 16" for my 35lb girl. It's a little big, I hope it doesn't stretch out. But I didn't want it too small so I went with this size. It is definitely NOT "Rosy pink and red polka dots". It is Orange through and through with cream colored dots and dark orangey dots. Orange is my least favorite color, but I don't want to deal with returning. It's a bummer. Don't know how the colors could be so far off from the description and the picture posted on the site.
customer_reviews.author: amiamom

customer_reviews.title: Wrong website description
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made sweater. It is thick and great for winter time. Unfortunately the sizing is off by 1 inch from every direction so it fits very tight on my dog. He is 30 lbs and his measurement is Neck 15", Chest 25", Lenght 16". I ordered size XL-16" lenght, according to the item's description it should have fit. FYI, the color of the sweater looks pink on the website but it is more like red. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Bubbles

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit! 20”
customer_reviews.text: This dog hoodie is adorable and fits my 3 year old corgi/red heeler Australian cattle dog PERFECTLY! My dog doesn’t mind wearing this hoodie at all, in fact he likes it. I’m glad that I ordered the 20” size because any smaller and it would not have fit. He has a big chest and wide neck, long body and short legs. I love this hoodie on him! It is great quality, doesn’t have a ton of stretch but just enough for him to be comfortable. He is able to run and play perfectly, without any constriction.
customer_reviews.author: BritBeeTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Even cuter than it looks!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect in every way. Soft and just the right amount of stretchy. We got the 14" for our 14lb Chihuahua mix. She is a little longer than a full-blooded and has kind of a long neck. It fits her perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Mary ONeal

customer_reviews.title: Soft and pretty
customer_reviews.text: Fits a liiiittle snug, and the bow did fall off after a few wears... (my pups are very active and playful so that may have been no fault of the sweater) but that being said the material is very soft and if you order a size up your fur baby will love it!! And there’s no harm in taking a few minutes to see the bow back in.
customer_reviews.author: Mickayla R.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, thick, fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Love. I have terrible luck w dog sweaters quality and sizing. I have a miniature poodle who is fairly big stature size...but thin and lanky. He is 11 lbs but at least 12 inches long. Large fit perfect. Thick high quality. I could do wo pom poms bc I doubt they will hold up in wash but who knows? AND delivered in a day in time for our midwest temperature plunge.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly L. Livesay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and just gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: My dachshund is 6 and a half pounds and the sweater is a little loose on her for now. I don’t mind as she is only 4 months and will grow into it. The sweater is long enough on her and very easy to put on. Just pop over head and slip her front legs in the leg openings. I love the colors with pastel pinks and purples and goes well with her purple harness. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: MZovich

customer_reviews.title: Great Sweater
customer_reviews.text: I love this sweater. I did alot of research to find the right one for my doxie. She loves going outside with me but it's so cold and she has thin hair. This was perfect. Shes about 12 inches long on her back so I got the medium and it fit perfect!
customer_reviews.author: JLP

customer_reviews.title: It's huge!
customer_reviews.text: Really, really soft and the quality is very nice. However the sizing on this sweater is way off. The sweater is so long it covers my 16 lb. poodle's butt and the neck is so wide it sits nowhere near his neck but rides low on his shoulders. I also purchased another brand for my dog (same size) and this one is twice as big. The other shirt fits perfectly. I'll be returning this one.
customer_reviews.author: Yellow Rose of Texas

customer_reviews.title: Great little sweater!
customer_reviews.text: You can't always be sure about the quality and fit of dog clothes online. But I thought this looked pretty good, so I gave it a try. It's such a nice sweater! It's well made, properly edged so it won't fray, a good actual sweater thickness and fits properly. I got the 16" for my pug... it's a couple inches long, but it's the right fit around her chest. Only thing to be aware of is that the color is a little more of an orangey red than a true red, but I think it still looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Akron Reader

customer_reviews.title: Cutest little puppy hoodie sweater ever!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve received so many compliments on this little sweater, my Maltipoo puppy is so cute in it. 🥰 The girls at the vet’s office all commented on how much they loved her little hoodie and were joking that they would wear it in their size if they could, lol. It’s very comfy and Ruby doesn’t seem to mind being in it all day at the office. I’ve washed it and dried it a couple times now. I can’t tell if it’s shrinking or if she’s just out growing it (cause she’s definitely getting bigger.) Great buy, highly recommend! 👍 👌
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Fits true to size.
customer_reviews.text: Lüna loves her new sweater! I ordered her the 14”. She is 13 lbs and I would call her a small to medium small. I ordered a different Blueberry Pet sweater in the same size. I just ordered a 3rd sweater in the 12” because I think the 14” is slightly large on her. I do love this sweater though. It’s cute and sporty. I think she looks pretty cute in it! She is a Chinese Crested/terrier mix.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Cute, doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: My havapoo looked cute for Christmas but one pom fell off the first day. The rest of the poms fell off by the end of the week. Within 10 days, the sweater looks ratty and was pilling bad. Doesn't look cute anymore but served its purpose I guess. I just think it should be made to last. We got the 10 inch and it was perfect for our small 7lb havapoo.
customer_reviews.author: MAB

customer_reviews.title: Very cute dog sweater!
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute sweater for my girl dog. I tried 16" first for my 25lb poodle mix (she has a relatively skinny shape) but it was too small and hardly managed put it on her. I wanted to have 18" but somehow 18" was not on sale. I exchanged with 20". It is too large for my dog but I kept it thinking it may be wearable if I giver her inner layers.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Tail

customer_reviews.title: ... a 17lb mini schnauzer and the 14" fits her beautifully. Doesn't hang too long over her tail like ...
customer_reviews.text: Ruby is a 17lb mini schnauzer and the 14" fits her beautifully. Doesn't hang too long over her tail like a lot of clothes do. This is really nice material that's pretty thick, definitely meant to keep warm. Very true to size so go a size up if you want wiggle room. More red and blue in person than pink and black like it seems in the picture but overall as good quality of a shirt as I would buy for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit.  Poor website instructions.
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instructions on website to measure my dog so I would know which size to order. When it came it was way too small. The material however is very soft and comfy and well made. Returning and getting a larger one.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: So adorable! The material is perfect for a moderate to ...
customer_reviews.text: So adorable! The material is perfect for a moderate to chilly day. The 12" fits my French Bulldog pup perfectly with a little room to grow. The hood also fits her head which is somewhat of a rarity since Frenchies have those adorably big heads :) She loves it, its very comfortable for her to wear around and never tries to take it off. It's got a little hole for a harness hook too which is nice. Blueberry Pet has the cutest dog accessories, they're well made and fashion forward! I will definitely continue to buy from this brand!
customer_reviews.author: Kiersten

customer_reviews.title: Adorable, soft well-made sweater
customer_reviews.text: The sweater is soft, well made, washes and dries well and is absolutely darling! The small size fit my 5lb Pomeranian perfectly, she looks adorable and has received so many compliments. Most importantly, the sweater has kept my fur baby warm and comfy on her nighttime walks. I highly recommend the sweater for your pup!
customer_reviews.author: 1SandrainSF

customer_reviews.title: Adorable holiday sweater for adorable doggos!
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy with the quality and appearance of the sweater. The doggo I bought it for seemed comfortable wearing it... and she loved the attention. The little pom poms across the back of the sweater are the cutest part!
customer_reviews.author: Malyli

customer_reviews.title: The neckline is a little too big
customer_reviews.text: I have a 40 lb dog. I ordered a large It's a well made, adorable sweater and my dog loves wearing it. The only thing is that the neck hole is a little too large for my dog so it slides down. I probably should have ordered a medium but size wise she was borderline according to the measurements. I've washed and dried it twice and it's fine. I would recommend this sweater.
customer_reviews.author: Leesa

customer_reviews.title: Made Well - Good Value- Looks Nice
customer_reviews.text: I think my dog looks adorable in this sweater. It is a nice medium weight for keeping her warm. The fit is pretty good. She has a broad chest for it is just a tiny bit snug in that area. The measurement fit was pretty accurate though. If I bought a larger one it would be too long on her back. I think that the price I paid was a good value for what I got when I compare the cost to other shirts. Overall, I am very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: L. Shea

customer_reviews.title: Keira is stylin' and profilin' in her new sweater!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful design and cuddly soft! This sweater is very high quality and much nicer than anything I could find in local stores at even twice the price! The nice wide band under the chest will keep her warmer than some other styles. She is a 15 pound Shi Tzu and I ordered the 14 inch length. It fits nicely at the nape of her neck to the end of her body just before the tail. Excellent value!
customer_reviews.author: Little Mermaid in Newport News VA

customer_reviews.title: Superior quality and adorable dog sweater!
customer_reviews.text: I love the entire line of dog wear made by Blueberry Pets that I've purchased for my male & female small dogs. Everything is consistent in fit, quality & size. I've tried a myriad of other brands & they all end up stretched, torn, unraveling, etc. I stay with Blueberry Pets! My 8 lb. little "girly girl" dog loves to wear this adorable piece indoors on cool days, & always outside in the cool mornings. It's obviously very comfortable for her. Washes beautifully. I hang to dry- turns out perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Paul

customer_reviews.title: GREAT dog sweaters!!!
customer_reviews.text: The red one is more raspberry while the dotted is kind of bland - colorwise . I will post pictures when I can. The solid cable knit has a hole for the leash, the polka dotted one does NOT have a leash hole. Size 12" - my dog has a 9" neck, 12" chest and a longish back. The neck is much too big on both sweaters however, the way they are made, I will be able to put some wide/soft elastic inside to minimize 'drafts'. Overall they are a little big except for the length which is perfect. Both sweaters seem very soft and warm. I will buy this brand again with confidence .
customer_reviews.author: Daphne Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Not Accurate Sizing or quality
customer_reviews.text: I have a 12lb yorkie poo and this size M does NOT fit her at all! The fabric is rough, hard and scratchy I would have returned it if it weren't for the measly $2.18 I was going to be refunded for some reason. Anyway, I do NOT recommend this sweater at all. I will be donating it.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Noel

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute and Warm
customer_reviews.text: Love this sweater for my 8lb chihuahua/terrier mix. Originally bought the 14in but it was too long. Swapped for the 12in which fit perfectly. Haven't washed it yet - hoping it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy fabric, dog self scratching will rip fast
customer_reviews.text: It’s definitely a cute sweater, but the fabric is very flimsy. So, as most of you may know, dogs scratch themselves, even while wearing a sweater, , which means after the 1st scratch, it will rip 🙅🏼‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Mical GT

customer_reviews.title: sweater
customer_reviews.text: The 16" size fit just about right on my ~35 lb. rat terrier mix, he has a narrow belly but a pretty deep chest. It is well-made and he seems content enough to wear it all day without squirming to get it off. I'm not sure whether the hood was intended to be functional, but it was a bit too small to fit over his head. I don't mind since he doesn't like it covering his ears anyway. Wish it came in other colors, I would get him another one
customer_reviews.author: Lucy W

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute sweater! It’s cozy and comfy but not too heavy so my puppy can hang out in the house with it on. The color wasn’t as expected, in the pictures it looks like it’s a dark grey and peachy pink but it’s actually navy and red but I don’t mind all that much! I would’ve sized up just because I have a growing pup. I love that it has it has the hole on top so you can attach the leash to the harness.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: I don’t have a sweater this nice! The fit and style was perfect!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this sweater! Percy did not want it taken off. We went to a Valentine Party and he was a celebrity in this sweater!
customer_reviews.author: Mavis Barrette

customer_reviews.title: Great quality dog sweater
customer_reviews.text: My little dog loves wearing sweaters and this one is just wonderful. It fits well (she’s 5 pounds and I bought the 12” length), is stylish, and the pom poms make it unique.
customer_reviews.author: Lea Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: It's cute but was a little large on my 4 month old Chihuahua poodle mix. I got the 10 inch and she Is about 5 pounds. However I think she will grow into it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Sweater!
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty surprised with how good the quality of these sweaters are. It took me a few times to orders to figure out what size actually fit my dogs but I got it finally. I tried to follow the sizing chart but I ended up with a size way too small. I'm excited for my dogs wear these through the remainder of winter. They are nice and thick and keep my dogs cozy!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: So so cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is so so cute and fits really well! My dog is a large dog (currently a little under weight from the shelter we adopted her at), she's 43 pounds currently and she is supposed to get slightly bigger and fill out, I think this will fit perfectly. Here is a current picture of her and it fits just fine, she looks super cute, and the cut of the sweater is better than any I've see before
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Sweater
customer_reviews.text: We have a 60 lb Labrador mix and the sweater fitted perfectly. Chula looked so pretty carrying a birthday balloon for my daughter. Very satisfied with this purchase. I have ordered other items for our pet with the same great results.
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty, soft and warm. I wash it in the washing machine in a mesh bag in cold water and then air dry it. No shrinkage and still soft!
customer_reviews.author: JanF7

customer_reviews.title: Jack Russel Hound Mix XL/16 inch length
customer_reviews.text: We just got it in the mail today. I ordered an xl or 16 inch length for my jack russel hound mix. She’s got a long body and barrel chest. It looks great on her and she’s still wearing it a couple hours later. Great wool sweater and I’d love to match her if I could. We live in Florida, so it’s a nice thing to wear inside and lounging around.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Super cute. It is a blue and reddish color. It's slightly tight from her neck to her armpits, but the sizing matches the chart posted. My dog just has a larger girth area. She hasn't tried tearing it off and it isn't itchy. Very nice material. Already getting compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Piper

customer_reviews.title: No Harness Hole
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this and there is NO harness hole. The description is not accurate
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great for long thin dogs
customer_reviews.text: This is the only sweater I have ever found that fits my long skinny rat terrier. She is always cold and this sweater goes all the way to her tail. It does not fray as easily as others. This is the second one just like this one I have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Orlandoguy82

customer_reviews.title: So cute and soft, our pups favorite sweater!
customer_reviews.text: So cute and soft, our pups favorite sweater! Our dog LOVES to wear sweaters, he begs for them and whined when you take them off. He will often bring this one over and place it on my lap, so I'm pretty sure it's his favorite! True to size, well made, soft, and super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Maddie.Rigotti

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, but...
customer_reviews.text: It looks great, but it came a little too big. I never measured my dog, everywhere that sells pet clothing has different sizing. I measured for this but I rounded up and it was more like I doubled up. I like how loose it looks; more of a casual look. Just be sure to round down.
customer_reviews.author: AWyatt

customer_reviews.title: Give your baby the fashionable sweater they deserve
customer_reviews.text: I love Blueberry’s sweaters. The material is nice and the patterns are fun. My mini schnauzer looks so cute in them. Wish they have more sweaters with multi colors because I have bought all their patterned sweaters.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnielass

customer_reviews.title: Easy and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Got the hang of putting it on and when I take it off she now knows to help so I pull and she pulls back and off it comes. Very cute, gotten a lot of comments about it. Warm too. I also appreciate the slit in the back that works well with her harness.
customer_reviews.author: Kate KenworthyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Received wrong size
customer_reviews.text: When I received this I knew immediately it was wrong size and it was. Requested return and refund is pending at this time. I requested a refund as the quality of this sweater was awful. It is veery thinly made which shocked me as I thought Bluberry produced a good quality garment not this one. Will not order anything in the future.
customer_reviews.author: zoedamama

customer_reviews.title: Received wrong size
customer_reviews.text: I was so disappointed ☹️ I got this for my baby girl Alice. She’s a 50lb Blue nose pit so I got her the 20”inch . Instead they sent me a package with 20”inch on the label and the actual sweater and tag on sweater were labeled as 16”inch. It was too small for her.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect dog sweaters
customer_reviews.text: These sweaters are of exceptional quality and fit well. The colors are pretty and they look adorable on my little dog, who feels warm and cozy. The fabric is great and hasn't pilled. All around, these are simply GREAT.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen from Waterville, ME

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: I have a small pomeranian and I got this for her to wear on valentines day. Super cute! Made well. And fit her great. There's a hole for your harness/leash to go through. No complaints at all!!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Moore

customer_reviews.title: Trendy WARM hoodie that fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Min Pins are already prone to cold, and our senior lost most of his fur at the shelter before we adopted him. He loved this hoodie, it's soft and fits him perfectly, all the way to the tail (where he is completely hairless). It also covers his belly, so he stays even warmer than in the other fleece coats. The colors look even better than the picture; I wish I could get a matching one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: T.

customer_reviews.title: Cute but pompoms are falling off!
customer_reviews.text: Cute sweater, knit is soft and cozy. The one I bought had pompoms though that started to fall off on the second day. If the sweater had no pompoms it would be just fine.
customer_reviews.author: A. Goertz

customer_reviews.title: Not the color shown.
customer_reviews.text: If you like ORANGE, you'll love this dog sweater. The picture does not accurately show just how ORANGE this sweater is. Otherwise it is cute, soft and fits as expected. I returned it because I do not like ORANGE!
customer_reviews.author: NC Sandler

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Size
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed with this dog sweater. It's a very thick (two layers) and the sizing is correct. I ordered up to be sure it would fit and it's actually a little too big. I'm buying more of this brand. You can't beat this price.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie Mckee

customer_reviews.title: A little too short down the back
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these sweaters for my English Springer Spaniel for when she had to get shaved a few weeks back. Although the chest measurements were right, these sweaters run short in length and stretch easily around the neck. They are some of the only cute sweaters I could find though without an obnoxious print, animal, or saying on them. I recommend getting the chest size of the dog then going up 2 sizes for the sake of length.
customer_reviews.author: ANWFlock

customer_reviews.title: Love 'em!!!
customer_reviews.text: The 10" fit my 8lb chi mix girls beautifully, the sweaters are definitely a "winter weight"...the girls actually get hot! I do live in the deep south though. Sweaters held up in the wash, no distorting, colors did not even fade
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lilo loves her sweater
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sweater fits really well, my girl likes wearing sweaters because she gets cold easily . The hood is tiny - like in most sweaters but her head is massive so I’m used to hoodies not fitting her . I bought the 20inch , her chest is 28 inches and her neck is 18
customer_reviews.author: Paulina

customer_reviews.title: It Fit Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: My Icelandic Lopi sweater fit my Mini Poo perfectly and I got the back length of 14 inches. She weighs 15 pounds and is longer than many miniature poodles but the sweater covers her back, washes well and looks very cute on her, but then I am partial to my little girl.
customer_reviews.author: K. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate sizing this time...
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, good quality Valentine sweater. The sizing with this brand is inconsistent though. The Christmas sweater in 14" is significantly longer than this Valentine 14". This one is at best 12" in length. It's short on my 19lb mini schnauzer but not so much that it's worth returning.
customer_reviews.author: C.Snave

customer_reviews.title: CUTE and SOFT!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE how cute and SOFT this little sweater is! When I first put it on my dog, she looked like a little princess (but she can also act like a little diva)! LoL! The bow on the back of the sweater is one of my favorite things about it and it makes my dog look like she is a cute little present for someone. The sweater keeps her warm on chilly days and it doesn’t get in the way of her business, so nothing gets on it. Yay! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Gottalovedogs

customer_reviews.title: Good quality - size was off
customer_reviews.text: The sweater JUST barely fit my girl. I measured her out before ordering. I chose the Medium. Unfortunately the sweater is about 2.7 inches shorter than the chart stated it was. Still cute and soft and not cheaply made! It doesn’t look dumb so we are keeping it. *NOTE: select the next size up from what you think you would choose.
customer_reviews.author: Cema

customer_reviews.title: Pretty!
customer_reviews.text: These sweaters are what I expected from Blueberry. The colors are vibrant and fit well and are well made. I'm a big fan of Blueberry, having purchased quite a few over the years. I've never been disappointed. The fit is always perfect, just make sure to measure your dog and check the size chart to order the correct size. The sweaters wash well and I usually air dry them but they can be machined dried. You'll love them!
customer_reviews.author: marianne

customer_reviews.title: Well made but...
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so they arrived on time and fit the dogs perfectly. The material is thick and warm. My only draw back is the red sweater is not red, it's more of a salmon color. So now our boy dog is in a salmon colored sweater! So if you have 2 female dogs, they will love them!!
customer_reviews.author: ellen

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable! I bought the 12" size and it fits my papillon perfectly! I was surprised at the quality. Seems well made, no weird seams or pattern mismatch. I haven't washed this yet, so jury is still out. Looks just like the picture. Fits great. Great buy. Heavier sweater material so I'm thinking this will keep her warm when it's super cold. I'm happy with and I'd buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Bright, adorable & warm sweater!
customer_reviews.text: My pup looks great & stays warm in this adorable sweater. True to size measurements. Easy on & off. She looks forward to putting it on when it’s colder!!
customer_reviews.author: ViolaPink

customer_reviews.title: Warm and true to size
customer_reviews.text: Fits very true to size chart, soft and warm. The arms are not too snug as some dog sweaters can be. I recommend the Blueberry brand to friends and will purchase more outfits.
customer_reviews.author: jeannie

customer_reviews.title: 12" is a little long on my Shih-Poo
customer_reviews.text: Cute sweater. I bought the 12" size for my 12 pound Shih-Poo. It fits around the body and keeps her warm on our walks, but it is just a tad too long (it bunches a bit at her upturned tail). Maybe it will shrink a little if I wash/dry it... All in all, I am happy with this purchase. It it a well-made/high quality item.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the buy !
customer_reviews.text: This is so soft and so stinking cute my pit/beagle loves her sweater shes always cold I put this on her and it works as a thunder jacket for her and she just snuggles in and takes naps
customer_reviews.author: Hayhayk

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Princess loves her new sweater. It is very well made and excellent quality. It looks hand knitted. The only down side is the bow fell off after about an hour and i cant find it.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Kazarian

customer_reviews.title: Love this sweater
customer_reviews.text: This two tone sweater is so cute for my min pin that weighs 91/2 pounds. Follow the size instructions. It is a great sweater. I’m going to order another.
customer_reviews.author: A T

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, good-looking, and practical!
customer_reviews.text: I loved these doggie 'sweaters' for my two small dogs! I rolled them up n they peeked out of their Christmas stockings. From a conservative ($) point of view these are amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Garza

customer_reviews.title: Very small head opening compared to length
customer_reviews.text: Shirt was more of a red and navy and also very narrow in the head and chest. Would have fit length wise but the dogs head wouldn’t fit through the head hole
customer_reviews.author: Rachel M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sweater! Well made!
customer_reviews.text: The sweater is perfect for my old lady. She is a 6 lb. toy poodle & the 10” fits her perfect. This is the second blueberry sweater I have purchased, and I am very pleased with the quality. Will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Not a great fit...
customer_reviews.text: The sweater is super cute and I love the colors on my dog, however it creeps up on her and then at times pulls down the back near her tail and starts to pull at the front of her neck, which she hates...
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Yanez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Valentine’s Day sweater
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sweater for my little beagle. She looks so adorable in it & keeps her warm. It’s well made and washes well too. I usually wash it and let it air dry. This is the perfect sweater for Valentine’s Day!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Poor boy HATED that cone which he dragged through his ...
customer_reviews.text: Our cat recently had to have his front leg amputated at the shoulder. The vet put him into a cone collar to keep him from gnawing at his stitches. Poor boy HATED that cone which he dragged through his food and litter box. This sweater was a much better alternative. Kept his stitches cover and let him get around much more easily.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Big size perfect for lab!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about the sizing but the largest size fits perfectly! My dog is a lanky lab mix with a big chest (30” around) and this is just right. It seems comfy for her, too, and the hood doesn’t get in the way. She’s about 55lb and is 29” from base of neck to tail and this is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little sweater
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this sweater for my rescued 8lb Maltese/Chihuahua mix. The quality is excellent, fit her perfectly. In fact, it's the only sweater she can't remove by herself. The main color is more coral than red which I really like better. I previously ordered a Blueberry sweater for another dog and it was equally wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Measure your pet before you order!
customer_reviews.text: The medium is "snug" on my smaller pooch, and the larger size is too big for my 46 pound puppy. Fortunately, my smaller pooch did not mind the snug fit, however, the larger size got pulled/stepped on, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Cloud nine

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but runs very small
customer_reviews.text: This sweater is soft and light. Cute design. The biggest problem is it runs very small! I'm really tempted to exchange it for a larger size, but I already washed it ! Oh well, next time I will order it larger.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Kraft

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well made!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several Blueberry sweaters and leashes for our 3 dogs. The look great, are affordable and of great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sulrij

customer_reviews.title: This is a very cute sweater, but was huge ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute sweater, but was huge on my dog even though I measured her and followed the size chart. Unfortunately, I missed the return window so now I'm stuck with a sweater that doesn't remotely come close to fitting my dog. I'd suggest ordering this in a size smaller than what measurements show that you need.
customer_reviews.author: Always Write

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Measured by toy Pomeranian that is 6 lbs and the 10" was a little too tight. I've bought other clothes for her by other brands and the 10" is supposed to fit loosely. Buy a size up!
customer_reviews.author: undero

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as it Looks
customer_reviews.text: The sweater fits perfectly as described on the size chart. It's really cute and the material is top quality. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: lmpu

customer_reviews.title: Cute and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Fits my dog perfectly. Is thicker than some sweaters which is great for our climate. Cute design and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Constant Reader

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: I like the feel of it: very soft. Looks pretty too. Measure your dogs before you buy. I didn't. The measurements are very true. My dog can still wear it but it is a little short.
customer_reviews.author: V.D.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Inaccurate size chart. I wasn’t able to exchange these. Now I have two sweaters that I’ll be donating.
customer_reviews.author: Ekf1129

customer_reviews.title: Cutest ever.
customer_reviews.text: The quality is fantastic. I measure my pup at 16 and bought the 14 and it fits beautifully. I wanted it to be "form fitting" and it is and hits her a little below mid back. I highly recommend this company.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky 11

customer_reviews.title: BLUEBERRY IS THE BEST!
customer_reviews.text: After trying several manufactures, BLUEBERRY IS THE BEST! Excellent quality, a great choice of colors! Machine wash & dry! True to size covering their little hips and bums!
customer_reviews.author: Linda in Maine

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Our pup took to this with no problems. She is well protected from the cold but it doesn't hamper her in any way. Other coats we've bought cause her to stand rigid until we remove them. She doesn't seem to mind using this.
customer_reviews.author: Mundico

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Sweaters for my Chihuahuas!
customer_reviews.text: I have problems finding sweaters to fit my chihuahuas so thought I'd give this brand a try and I'm really happy! They fit these 2 eleven pound pups perfectly! They are very well made, high quality material and great workmanship! Very happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: Debra L. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It was smaller than expected. Gave to my neighbors dog. And not as soft as I would have liked.
customer_reviews.author: katherine sheets

customer_reviews.title: Color is not right.
customer_reviews.text: The sweater is what I was looking for. I wanted something warmer and more snug that my terrier wouldn’t wiggle out of. Fits her a tad big but not enough to send back. My one problem is the marbled color in the picture looks light pink and heather grey, but the sweater it totally red and blue. That was annoying because I wanted the grey and pink. Oh well it will work.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette

product_meta.title: Blueberry Pet 9 Patterns Fair Isle/Lopi Designer Pullover Interlock Dog Sweater and Matching Sweater for Pet Owner
product_meta.description: Size:Back Length 16"| Color:Marled Color-blockYou might doubt about the marled sweater on your adorable 4 legged friends. But you should never say no to this trendy style. Finished with subtly contrasted color block shades of grey and red, we love the lure of this marled dog sweater. Blueberry Pet wants to mark this piece as one of the best quality and effortless stylish dog sweater in history! Sounds a bit exaggerated? Please keep reading the descriptions. First, color selection is truly neutral which fit lovely girls and handsome boys. You should never doubt 'is it too harsh for her or is it too cute for him? ' This is a unisex piece. Second, with shots of cream white running through the red and grey, this sweater is made with the combination of iconic trends - marled knits and color-blocking. Third, this sweater is not too heavy or too light. With the material being 100% acrylic, this sweater is warm enough for evening walk and light even for running around. Forth, this sweater comes with a lovely hood!
feature_bullets: Back Length 16", Chest Girth 21"- 25", Neck 15"; Measure your dog from the base of the neck to the base of the tail for back length.
The sweater body is made with 100% acrylic material for ease care and durability.
The leash/harness hole is smartly included to make it easy to leash your pup for outdoor activities
Machine-washable with similar color items in cold water on the gentle cycle
Each dog sweater is shipped in a polybag with a hang card; Imported

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
